longBusinessSummary: Berli Jucker Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and services for packaging, consumer, healthcare and technical, and modern retail supply chain business in Thailand. It designs, manufactures, markets, and distributes glass, aluminum cans, and plastic packaging products. The company provides Cellox facial tissues and toilet papers, Zilk toilet papers, Maxmo multi-purpose papers, Tasto potato chips, Dozo rice crackers, Party and Campus extruded snacks, Parrot soaps, and Dermapon baby soaps, and provides logistics services. It also distributes pharmaceutical and healthcare products, medical imaging, and medical equipment and supplies; solutions for graphic, stationery, and specialty products; and industrial chemical ingredients, engineering products and systems, galvanized steel structures, and digital printing technology. The company also operates network of multiple physical and online store; provides rental spaces to its one-stop shopping destination; and wholesale business serving B2B customers, bookstore, coffee shop, and drug store business. It also offers food supplement and cosmetics; customs clearing, warehousing, transportation, and distribution services; manufactures snack foods and dairy products; operates a non-alcohol beverage shop; sells imaging products, construction supplies, and animal feeds; confectionery; and sanitary paper products; tofu, soymilk, and kimchi products. It provides agent and investment services; trademark management; seminar and training center; consultant services for product analysis and data collection; land transport and freight services; solar and wind power; retails books and magazine; real estate; bill payment service; e-commerce; information service; market service; merchandise sourcing; digital marketing; and invests in energy business and trading equipment. The company was founded in 1882 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Berli Jucker Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of TCC Corporation Company Limited.
